Text: Postdoc Elisa received pilot grant to study the role of LRRK2 in PD.
The lab received NIH R56 grant to study the role of alternative splicing in neurodegeneration.
Clinical Research Fellow Giulietta received Parkinson's Foundation Grants to study DNA Methylation in PD.
The lab receives a NIH U01 Grant (with Drs. Rachel Saunders-Pullman) to study GBA Modifiers in Parkinson’s disease

Postdoc Elisa received an ADRC Pilot grant on her proposal “Using single-cell biology to identify immune biomarkers for Alzheimer’s disease. Congratulations Elisa!

Madison was accepted to (another!) medical school, Penn State.
Research associate Madison was accepted to medical school!
New members Brian and Katia have joined our lab! Welcome Brian and Katia!
New member Maojuan joined our lab. Welcome Maojuan!
Our work on alternative splicing in AD was published in Nature Genetics! Great job team!
Post-doctoral Fellow Elisa was awarded the Ramon Areces Foundation Fellowship. Congrats Elisa!
